system.summary: Attempt to create a convincing forgery of a document or image.

description.value: As a Rest Action, you can attempt to create a forgery. The forgery can be of a document or other text no longer than a page, an identification, or a simple badge or image. When you do, make an Intelligence (Craft) check. The result of that roll determines the DC that is necessary to recognize that the forgery is a fake.
